text: The Gods Must Be Crazy II is a 1989 South African Botswanan movie directed by Jamie Uys and is the sequel to the 1980 The Gods Must Be Crazy. It stars N!xau reprising his role, Hans Strydom, Lena Farugia and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1989 comedy movies Category:1980s sequel movies Category:South African comedy movies Category:Botswanan movies Category:Movies set in Africa Category:Movies set in deserts Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Jamie Uys
title: The Gods Must Be Crazy II
